name: tapas-rss
description: A webextension to add an rss button to tapas.io webcomics pages

scripts.build: npm run build:firefox && npm run build:chrome
scripts.build:firefox: npm run manifest:firefox && web-ext build -a web-ext-artifacts/firefox
scripts.build:chrome: npm run manifest:chrome && web-ext build -a web-ext-artifacts/chrome
scripts.manifest: npm run manifest:firefox && npm run manifest:chrome
scripts.manifest:firefox: node scripts/merge_manifests.js manifests/common.json manifests/firefox.json && cp manifest.json manifest-firefox.json
scripts.manifest:chrome: node scripts/merge_manifests.js manifests/common.json manifests/chrome.json && cp manifest.json manifest-chrome.json
scripts.test: npm run test:unit && npm run test:cypress
